Text.Name: Ls_XuanWuShield
Text.Desc: Greatly improves the strength of a friendly Qi Barrier and Toughness of its Secret Body.

Text.Name: Ls_XuanWuBreak
Text.Desc: Significantly decreases one enemy's Qi Barrier and secret body endurance.

Text.Name: Ls_XuanWuForm
Text.Desc: Increases allies' Formation Stability and grants one Formation Energy. Can only be used on Formations in battle.

Text.Name: Ls_XuanWuDefac
Text.Desc: Exposes the Auxiliary of enemy's Formation.
